subject: Simsonn Pedal Haptics Question
description_text:
Hello,

Do the currently listed Simsonn Plus X Pedals with Haptics come with the
new vertical mounting brackets? I would like to order them but want to make
sure I am getting the correct brackets to go along with them.

Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Saba,     Our vibration motors are available in both horizontal and vertical mounting options. You can refer to this accessory or check the specifications on the vibration motor product page.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-haptic-reactor-mounting-brackets

Perfect. Thank you for the reply. One last question, hopefully: If ordering
the pedals from your website, the Plus, not the Pro, will I need to also
order the haptics control box or does each pedal set come with that
standard. It was not exactly clear from the notes on the product page.

Thank you again for your help!

On Wed, Nov 26, 2025 at 6:02 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi Mark Saba,  The latest version on our official website is PlusX. Its control box supports vibration feedback interfaces. If you want vibration feedback, you only need to purchase the motor and power supply separately.

If I have an Aluminum profile rig(Simlab GT1 EVO) with a pedal baseplate
already, would I require your Simsonn baseplate still, or could I just use
the Carbon Fiber heel plate. And does the heel plate come with necessary
hardware to mount it in the correct lifted position without your Simsonn
baseplate?

On Thu, Nov 27, 2025 at 11:04 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Mark Saba,  Without the base plate, the riser plate cannot be installed. If you don’t need a riser plate and the pedals can be installed directly, the base plate is not necessary and does not need to be purchased.
